sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO supplies_stocks_group2(stock_id, supply_id, date_added, purchase_date, reference_no, quantity, last_user) VALUES(stock_stockId_seq.NEXTVAL, #supplyId#, #dateAdded#, #purchaseDate#, #referenceNo#, #quantity#, #lastUser#)
